title: Emerald Cascade Haaram: A Symphony of Diamonds and Gemstones
materials: Premium quality diamonds with Fg color
Emeralds with a rich green hue. Base metal is high quality gold which is coated by Hyderabad polish. Diamond with marquis cut and round cut.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a mesmerizing cascade design, with three layers of intricately arranged diamond-studded floral and leaf motifs. Each strand gracefully culminates in a captivating emerald pendant, adding a touch of regal elegance. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the brilliance of the diamonds, creating a radiant and luxurious appeal.
colors: Predominantly brilliant white (diamonds) and vivid green (emeralds)
accented by the warm tones of the gold base.
occasions: Perfect for grand celebrations like weddings
and milestone anniversaries. Ideal for traditional South Indian events such as muhurtham
and half-saree function. Its modern design also makes it suitable for high-end cocktail parties and formal galas.
description: This Haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The cascade design is a modern take on the traditional Haaram, making it a unique and versatile piece. The combination of diamonds and emeralds is considered auspicious and adds a touch of regal charm. Owning this piece is like owning a piece of Hyderabadi jewelry heritage.
